title: FF! Doc | BatchBlobTransformerPipe
paragraphs: BatchBlobTransformerPipe: Not tested and maintained, please look for alternatives if you use BatchBlobTransformerPipe inform WeAreFrank! that there are no suitable alternatives for your use-case
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

BatchBlobTransformerPipe: Not tested and maintained, please look for alternatives if you use BatchBlobTransformerPipe inform WeAreFrank! that there are no suitable alternatives for your use-case

Pipe that batch-transforms the lines in a BLOB.
See also
Github - BatchBlobTransformerPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.jdbc.BatchBlobTransformerPipe
Syntax
Copy
<BatchBlobTransformerPipe query="" name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
query	text	-
The SQL query text to be executed each time sendMessage() is called
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
blobCharset	text	-
blobsCompressed
